verses.verse: Then <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H5975>it,<s%> and set up its <S%H1817>doors;<s%> even to the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3968>Hammeah<s%> they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H4026>it,<s%> to the tower of <S%H2606>Hananel.<s%>
Next to <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> Next to them <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5570>Hassenaah<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> They laid its <S%H7136>beams,<s%> and set <S%H5975>up<s%> its <S%H1817>doors,<s%> its <S%H4514>bolts,<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Hakkoz<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%> Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabel<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%> Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1195>Baana<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs;<s%> but their <S%H117>nobles<s%> <S%H935>didn't<s%> put their <S%H6677>necks<s%> to the <S%H5656>work<s%> of their <S%H113>lord.<s%>

<S%H3111>Joiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1152>Besodeiah<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> They laid its <S%H7136>beams,<s%> and set <S%H5975>up<s%> its <S%H1817>doors,<s%> and its <S%H4514>bolts,<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H4424>Melatiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite,<s%> and <S%H3036>Jadon<s%> the <S%H4824>Meronothite,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and of <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3678>residence<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2736>Harhaiah,<s%> <S%H6884>goldsmiths,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%> Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> <S%H1121>one<s%> of the <S%H7546>perfumers<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs,<s%> and they <S%H5800>fortified<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> even to the <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6418>district<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>them,<s%> <S%H3042>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2739>Harumaph<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> across from his <S%H1004>house.<s%> Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2813>Hashabneiah<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

<S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> and <S%H2815>Hasshub<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahathmoab,<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H8574>furnaces.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3873>Hallohesh,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6418>district<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> he and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

<S%H2586>Hanun<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2182>Zanoah<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> They <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5975>it,<s%> and set up its <S%H1817>doors,<s%> its <S%H4514>bolts,<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall<s%> to the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H6418>district<s%> of Beth <S%H1021>Haccherem<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5975>it,<s%> and set up its <S%H1817>doors,<s%> its <S%H4514>bolts,<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

<S%H7968>Shallun<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3626>Colhozeh,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H6418>district<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H5869>spring<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2926>it,<s%> and covered <S%H5975>it,<s%> and set up its <S%H1817>doors,<s%> its <S%H4514>bolts,<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H7975>Shelah<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1588>garden,<s%> even to the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> that go <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H5166>him,<s%> Nehemiah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5802>Azbuk,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6418>district<s%> of Beth <S%H1049>Zur,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> to the place opposite the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to the <S%H1295>pool<s%> that was <S%H6213>made,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3881>him,<s%> the Levites, <S%H7348>Rehum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%> Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6418>district<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> for his <S%H6418>district.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H251>him,<s%> their brothers, <S%H942>Bavvai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6418>district<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

Next to <S%H3027>him,<s%> <S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> across from the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> to the <S%H5402>armory<s%> at the turning of the <S%H4740>wall.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H1263>him,<s%> Baruch the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2079>Zabbai<s%> <S%H2734>earnestly<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> from the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H4822>him,<s%> Meremoth the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Hakkoz<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> even to the <S%H8503>end<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib.<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3548>him,<s%> the priests, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H3603>Plain<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H1144>them,<s%> Benjamin and <S%H2815>Hasshub<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> across from their <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H5838>them,<s%> Azariah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6055>Ananiah<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H1131>him,<s%> Binnui the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> to the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the <S%H6438>wall,<s%> and to the corner.

<S%H6420>Palal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H186>Uzai<s%> made repairs opposite the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the <S%H4026>wall,<s%> and the tower that stands <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> which is by the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Parosh made <S%H6551>repairs.<s%>

(Now the <S%H5411>Nethinim<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel,<s%> to the place over against the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> that stands <S%H3318>out.<s%>)

<S%H310>After<s%> him the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion,<s%> over against the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%> that stands <S%H3318>out,<s%> and to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6077>Ophel.<s%>
Above the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H5048>across<s%> from his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H6659>them,<s%> Zadok the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> across from his own <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H8098>him,<s%> Shemaiah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H2608>him,<s%> Hananiah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> and <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6764>Zalaph,<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>portion.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H4918>him,<s%> Meshullam the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> across from his <S%H5393>room.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H4441>him,<s%> Malchijah <S%H1121>one<s%> of the <S%H6885>goldsmiths<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5411>Nethinim,<s%> and of the <S%H7402>merchants,<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs<s%> over against the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H4663>Hammiphkad,<s%> and to the <S%H5944>ascent<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
Between the <S%H5944>ascent<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> the <S%H6884>goldsmiths<s%> and the <S%H7402>merchants<s%> made <S%H2388>repairs.<s%>
